name: bird game (read description)
description:
This game is a port from scratch, so it might be laggy.

Your goal is to get the worm. when you press play, the play button turns into a flap button. click the flap button (or anywhere on the screen) to flap. If you die, click the play button twice to restart.

The flap height is also pretty inconsistent and sometimes you will jump really high.
